authors.author: H.A. Hoffman von Fallersleben Joseph A. Seiss

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Fairest Lord Jesus!
Ruler of all nature!
O Thou of God and man the Son!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Thee will I cherish,
Thee will I honor,
Thou, my soul's glory,
Joy, and crown.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Fair are the meadows;
Fairer still the woodlands,
Robed in the blooming
Garb of spring.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Jesus is fairer,
Jesus is purer,
Who makes the woeful heart to sing.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Fair is the sunshine,
Fairer still the moonlight,
And all the twinkling, starry host.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Jesus shines brighter,
Jesus shines purer,
Than all the angels
Heav'n can boast.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Beautiful Savior!
Lord of the nations!

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Son of God and Son of man!
Glory and honor, praise adoration,
Now and forevermore be Thine!
